original_text: If you are wise, you should understand these things. If you understand, think carefully about them. The Lord teaches you to live in ways that are right. Righteous people live in those good ways. But people who turn against the Lord fall down and lose their way. 14: God teaches us to live in good ways that please him. If we are wise, we will let him teach us to do things that are right. If you are wise, you should understand these things. If you understand, think carefully about them. The Lord teaches you to live in ways that are right. Righteous people live in those good ways. But people who turn against the Lord fall down and lose their way. 14: God teaches us to live in good ways that please him. If we are wise, we will let him teach us to do things that are right. If you are wise, you should understand these things.
korean_text: 누가 지혜가 있어 이런 일을 깨달으며 누가 총명이 있어 이런 일을 알겠느냐 여호와의 도는 정직하니 의인은 그 길로 다니거니와 그러나 죄인은 그 길에 걸려 넘어지리라

sentences.original_text: to live in ways that are right
Righteous people live in those good ways
sentences.korean_translation: 의로운 사람들은 그 좋은 방식대로 산다

sentences.original_text: But people who turn against the Lord
fall down and lose their way
to live in good ways that please him
sentences.korean_translation: 그분을 기쁘시게 하는 좋은 방식으로 살도록

sentences.original_text: we will let him teach us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그분께서 우리를 가르치시게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: to do things that are right
